title: Where to buy new FontBook in LA?
content:
Anyone know where I can buy the new 2006 FontBook in Los Angeles? Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202143539im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/13_2_3570.jpg)

 [‹ The Sloped Roman](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202143539/http:/www.typophile.com/node/29998 "Go to previous forum topic") [Books, etc. on typographic ornamentation? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202143539/http:/www.typophile.com/node/29911 "Go to next forum topic")
author: packagingdesign

comments.content: The best way is online via FontShop USA: [http://www.fontshop.com/support/contact.cfm](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202143539/http:/www.fontshop.com/support/contact.cfm "http://www.fontshop.com/support/contact.cfm")

Wow, how did you end up at FS Norway’s page? FontShop USA’s [FontBook product page](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202143539/http:/www.fontshop.com/products/fontbook.cfm) is number 4 in the [Google results for “FontBook”](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202143539/http:/www.google.com/search?q=fontbook). And there’s always [FontBook.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202143539/http:/www.fontbook.com/).

Apparently we must be doing something right ;-)

Jacob
Total accident. I have no idea how I landed on that page. Perhaps I was searching for sardines.
